snippet: Mr. Trump, accepting the endorsement of the National Rifle Association, said Mrs. Clinton’s desire for stricter gun controls would put law-abiding citizens at risk.
abstract: National Rifle Assn endorses presumptive Republican nominee for president Donald J Trump; Trump, during speech at NRA's annual convention, goes on to slam his Democratic rival Hillary Rodham Clinton for backing restrictions on gun ownership.

byline.contributor: Amy Chozick contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump, accepting the endorsement of the National Rifle Association, said Mrs. Clinton’s desire for stricter gun controls would put law-abiding citizens at risk.

headline.main: Donald Trump Tells N.R.A. Hillary Clinton Wants to Let Violent Criminals Go Free
headline.print_headline: Trump Warns N.R.A. of Risks Under Clinton
